rancher_environment.description: Provides a Rancher Environment resource. This can be used to create and manage environments on rancher.

orchestration.description: Must be one of **cattle**, **swarm**, **mesos**, **windows** or **kubernetes**. This is a helper for setting the project_template_ids for the included Rancher templates. This will conflict with project_template_id setting. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

project_template_id.description: This can be any valid project template ID. If this is set, then orchestration can not be. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

member.description: Members to add to the environment.
